text:
GM Farcaster weekly recap: double issue for dual birthdays! GM! Well the last 2 weeks were filled with tech challenges, jury duty and birthdays! We took both of our birthdays off this past week so we only had 1 episode this past week. 

You'll find the past two weeks of episodes. Catch up on last week before we jump into the next!

https://paragraph.com/@gmfarcaster/gm-farcaster-double-issue-for-dual-birthdays

text:
29 Seconds of Farcaster ... What did you miss this weekend?

* @jacob dropped Zora Creator Coins announcement, many big supporters jumped on board; @jesse.base.eth shared his favorites (link in first comment)

* V announced that we will now see all replies that aren't spam when opening a conversation, a big change from previous filtering

* @bertwurst.eth celebrated National Dachshund Day w/ some cool art of FC Wieners & we had our first live Bert Cam of his walk last night üêæ 

* Livecaster with @sayangel was hopping last night for NBA Game 7 & setting records with 2K plus replies & interactions; lots of use cases üëÄ 

* @woj is ready to build...that is all.

* Vitalek was fighting with Grok; @adrienne was bullying her bot--which by the way was rebranded to Warpee, formerly GMFC101

* This Week In Mini Apps featured @linda @horsefacts.eth & guest @db to talk Intori (link in first comment)

* GM Farcaster is back! West Coast Friendly 11:30 AM EST/ 8:30 PST with @nounishprof & @adrienne (probably going a bit over 29 minutes) to catch you up on all the FC News https://farcaster.xyz/nounishprof/0x71c9de12

text:
New Feature: Manage muted and blocked accounts 

Go to Settings > Mute & block to see the users in each section. You can also undo these actions here. 

h/t to @gabrielayuso.eth for a fast ship!

We're simplifying how replies work on Farcaster.

When you open a conversation, you‚Äôll see replies from everyone who doesn't have a spam label. This is a big change from today, where we apply a lot more filtering by default. 

If you prefer more filtering, you can go to Settings > Feeds and set "Reply Filtering" to aggressive. This will only show from people you follow and algorithmic suggestions from Farcaster.

This only applies to casts that aren't in channels, since some channels have more rules around who can reply.  

h/t to @akshaan for the ship!

Should Farcaster add a "staking" verification system?  Please reply! 

Users can get "verified" badge by staking $10 USDC in a contract. The stake can be reclaimed at any time, but will only release after a delay (maybe 4-8 weeks). 

Verified users will get the following benefits: 

- Badge on profile. 
- Access to video uploads.
- Show up higher in conversations. 
- A small boost in the rewards program. 

The goal is to make it harder for spammers to verify so that good humans on Farcaster have a better experience!

üì£ PSA: Mini app signIn defaults are changing!

Auth addresses, quickAuth, and web sign in have been live for four weeks and widely adopted. We're planning to update the mini app SDK to accept signIn from auth addresses by default.

We'll ship this change two weeks from today, on July 3.

What this means for you:
üëâ  If you're building a new app, web sign in will just work
üëâ  If you have an existing app, defaults may change next time you upgrade the SDK. Pin your dependencies or update in the next two weeks.
üëâ If you're building a client, this should not impact you.

If this timeline is problematic for your app, please reach out.
my feed at 10:30am / my feed at 10:30pm

We just QA‚Äôed 30+ mini apps in Coinbase Wallet. 75% had issues. Some fully break in non-Farcaster clients. Others have small bugs ‚Äî 1-2 buttons that don‚Äôt work outside Farcaster. Some hardcoded Farcaster-only deeplinks (like share buttons).

We‚Äôll be pulling mini apps from featuring if they don‚Äôt meet quality bar.

If you‚Äôre a mini app dev, DM me on Farcaster. I‚Äôll add you to a group chat to help you catch issues before apps get hidden for issues.

7,724 accounts have earned Farcaster Rewards to-date

32 accounts (0.4%) have earned $1,000 or more

850 accounts (11%) have earned $100 or more

(Data from @mvr's Dune dashboard https://dune.com/queries/4943228)
There is a way higher percentage of women on this app than any crypto event I‚Äôve ever been to and I feel like that‚Äôs a pretty bullish sign.

As promised! Just in time for the weekend... 

@poolsuite mini app v0.1 ‚òº 

Shoutout my brother in leisure @lewisking for getting it together so quickly.

https://farcaster.xyz/miniapps/hI7o_jQXpIxk/poolsuite-

The best thing about Farcaster is that it‚Äôs an open backend that can be used to create many different kinds of frontends.

The initial Twitter clone flagship app shows how to use accounts, posts, likes, a feed, and other tools. And it also packages a wallet, embedded apps, and soon DMs.

But it‚Äôs only partially an app. It‚Äôs really a dev kit. Showing the sophistication of what can be built.

cast.text: Not realistic but I really wish we could stop comparing Farcaster to Twitter

text:
‚Äú@bracky is for everyone.‚Äù

Over 40 languages have been used to book sports bets on Farcaster!

The possibilities are huge.

It‚Äôs 5am in Berlin, NBA Finals just ended.

Sound on in video:
That‚Äôs thunder rolling in background‚Ä¶‚ö°Ô∏è

Two months of incredible basketball ends with a summer storm breaking the oppressive 100 degree heat of last couple days.

Congrats @garrett 
Valiant @degen-chad 
Good work @bracky

People might be surprised by this but my Farcaster following feed is talking about the NBA finals more than my Twitter feed. 

Narrative violation?

The Story of Bert...

@bertwurst.eth is dog.

He emerged around the start of the year ish. He rode his cuteness to a high place on the leaderboard his first week. BUT...

Through the sharp wit, kind heart, and social prowess of 'Assistant #1' helping to represent this 'little dog with a big heart' it went far beyond that. 

Bert is extremely generous on FC... buys art, tips, starts crowd funds, puts big chunks into crowd funds. He designs art (with the help of the robot-- AI), welcomes people, helps people find their way on FC.

There is a lot of joy and fun---reports on his life like walks, school, meeting new friends--human and dog, but there is a lot more than that... Bert has one of the best threads to date on how to fit in and grow an account on FC and has helped lots of FCers, especially new ones find a home here. 

s/o Bert & Assistant #1 for making Farcaster a better place with a lot of fun and joy üíú üêæ

cast.text:
Btw, who can tell me the story of @bertwurst.eth? 
Who is bertwurst? 
When they emerged? 
Why everyone's post Dachshund and tag bertwurst?
Is this a real human or a meme account?

Only questions, no answers, i didn't have time to investigate

text: is farcaster even real?

Final update: After a slow start in the primary feeds and channels, I looked at every person on the rewards leaderboard. Yes, I looked at the casts of 3,000 accounts today. Across my entire search, I came across 203 users I wasn't already following and have <100 followers.

I viewed more than 4,000 casts and only found 37 casts that fit my original criteria. I've decided to split the $125 reward among those 37 casts using likes with Noice. Why so few compared to my goal?

Ultimately, I did not compromise on my original criteria:

(1) cast by an account I don't follow already,
(2) has <100 followers, and
(3) I find genuinely interesting.

I didn't intend to prove any point about the algorithm, and I'm not sure it does. I simply wanted to pay my rewards forward. But going down this insane little rabbit hole sparked ideas + questions for me about new user discovery here, which I'll share eventually.

For now, I'll include links to those 37 casts in a reply below.

cast.text:
I received $125 in Farcaster leaderboard rewards this week (!) because people have been willing to take a chance on a newbie‚Äôs content. Now I‚Äôm paying that forward.

For the next 24 hours, I‚Äôm challenging myself to like 125 casts from different Farcasters I don‚Äôt follow, have <100 followers, and whose cast I genuinely find interesting. $1 via Noice per like.

I‚Äôll start browsing in channels like /welcome and /100club. Please send any other channel, starter pack, or user recommendations my way. ü§ç
